DOC.brief_summary: This study multicentered , prospective , randomized , open , parallel , intervention study . The aim study evaluate efficacy safety Montelukast sodium prevention bronchopulmonary dysplasia ( BPD ) preterm infant , 32weeks gestational age . The investigator evaluate first effectiveness morbidity mortality bronchopulmonary dysplasia . And , investigator evaluate second effectiveness oxygen index , usage mechanical ventilator take medicine 2 Weeks , Oxygen Utilization After 4 Weeks , Proinflammatory Cytokine bronchial lavage fluid .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Safety Montelukast Sodium Prevention Bronchopulmonary Dysplasia
DOC.criteria: Preterm infant bear less 32 week Birth 14 day , oxygen artificial ventilation use patient 20cal/kg/d enteral feed write consent parent congenital anomaly cardiovascular collapse investigator 's opinion
